analyzed: nnava su pūrṇa śaśāṅka kara aṅkitām
vividha puṣpa rasa āsava vedi api
aliḥ upetya niśā ardha mahā utsave
dhayati tad gata dhīḥ iti vismayaḥ
punar atas upi udayācala mauli tām

original: na ca śaśī na vibhāti divākaraḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: na ca śaśī na vibhāti divākaraḥ
yadi su śikṣita vajravilāsinī guru mukha adhigama udhigataḥ bhavet
bhavati yasya tadā uttama madhyama adhama viniścayam eti sa tattva dṛś
